CutSceneText.Text: I've heard rumors.... Is that Daeva really as brave as everyone says?
Yes, I saw it with my own eyes in battle against the Balaur.
In the name of the Five Empyrean Lords, I appoint thee as the new Brigade General of the Mirage Legion....
I guess they don't call you the "Thirteenth Empyrean Lord" without good reason.
Icaronix! Ecus! I couldn't have done it without you.
